caption.title: High rate performances of Î²-Ni(OH) 2 and LDH-Fe-Ni(OH) 2 materials. (a) Evolution of the discharge capacity with the C-rate represented as the ratio of the discharge capacity to the discharge capacity at a C-rate of 0.1C and, in the inset, as NEE, (b) average voltage of the (dis)charge curve for the different C-rates, (c) iR corrected OER Tafel plots and, in the inset, evolution of V OER with current density, and (d) sum of the kinetic overpotentials for different C-rates.
